name: Elementals (itch)
description:
Rouge-like game made in 24h on Medalikon Game Jam 2018 in Częstochowa, Poland

CONTROLS:

LMB: Attack

RMB: Change character

R: Restart Game :)

The game is based on elements and shapes. Each have some individual skills.

We start as a random one. When we defeat someone we take his power and we can change to him by RMB.

Shapes are responsible for kind of attack:

  • Cube: Dash
  • Sphere: Shoot
  • Cylinder: Melee attack by orbiting spheres around him

Also we have 4 elements with a pros and cons of every ;)

  • Fire
  • Ice
  • Lighting
  • Ground

Just get the every kind of character and defeat the final boss :)

CREDITS:

  • Marcin Wierzchoś - programming
  • Sebastian Senski - programming, visuals
